    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L2
    [function]                              5         12
    [fact]                                  14        17
    [(]                                     19        19
    [n]                                     20        20
    [)]                                     21        21
L3
    [if]                                    7         8
    [n]                                     10        10

    [return]                                9         14
    [1]                                     16        16

    [return]                                9         14
    [n]                                     16        16

    [end]                                   5         7
L10
    [print]                                 5         9
